Package org.ironmaple.utils.commands

Interface HolonomicDriveSubsystem

All Superinterfaces:
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimplifiedHolonomicDriveSimulation
public interface HolonomicDriveSubsystem extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem

common interface for a holonomic drive

field-centric drive logic and path-palnner configurations are written here, since these codes are used for both AI-Robots in the simulation and our main robot

    • getRawGyroYaw

      default edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation2d getRawGyroYaw()
      gets the raw gyro reading if exists; otherwise, returns the facing of the robot estimated by the odometry
      Returns:
      the raw gyro reading of the gyro, not calibrated

    • setPose

      void setPose(edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d currentPose)
      Resets the current odometry Pose to a given Pose
      Parameters:
      currentPose - the new pose yielding where the robot actually is

    • addVisionMeasurement

      default void addVisionMeasurement(edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d visionPose, double timestamp, edu.wpi.first.math.Matrix<edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N3,edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N1> measurementStdDevs)
      Adds a vision measurement to the pose estimator.
      Parameters:
      visionPose - The pose of the robot as measured by the vision camera.
      timestamp - The timestamp of the vision measurement in seconds.
      measurementStdDevs - the standard deviation of the measurement

    • stop

      default void stop()
      Stops the chassis, making it still. On default, it runs an empty speed.
